name: Harvest Reaper
description:
Help the Grim Reaper fulfil his monthly soul harvesting quota by slaying an entire village of peasants. But beware, it's guarded by skilled knights and archers.

Hold the attack for increased damage.
You can hover by holding jump while in the air.

Controls for Gamepad
South button - Jump
West button - Attack
D-Pad/Left thumbstick - Move

Controls for keyboard
WASD/Arrow keys - Move
J/C - Attack
K/X/Space - Jump
Esc - quit instantly.
